rooms.description: Open-plan living area integrated with the kitchen. Large windows on the east and south sides for natural light and cross ventilation in accordance with Vastu principles.
Sleek dining area adjacent to the open-plan living and kitchen. Minimalist design with natural stone finishes.
Spacious entrance hall designed to welcome guests. Includes a foyer with built-in storage and decorative lighting.

openings.description: Grand entry door with sound insulation and energy efficiency in mind.
Balcony window that allows for a view of the landscape while maintaining privacy.

additional_features.description: Integration with surrounding gardens, including pathways and seating areas.
Extended covered porch area for relaxation and social gatherings.

notes: Design integrates natural light and ventilation in line with both local building norms and Vastu principles. The open-plan layout encourages a seamless transition between living spaces, while the triplex arrangement ensures efficient use of space for luxury residential or commercial purposes.
